summary: This document is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) inmate roster dated July 28, 2019, listing hundreds of inmates with their names, housing locations, and admission statuses. It includes Jeffrey Epstein, who is listed as being admitted on July 8, 2019, and held in a special housing unit (H01-001L). The document provides a snapshot of the inmate population at the time, including running board counts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, admitted on July 8, 2019, with a housing location of H01-001L and status 'A-PRE'.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Admission to MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded as being admitted to the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: MCC Inmate Roster and Count
events.description: A roster and running board count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center is conducted, showing a total population of 767.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) with an admission date of July 8, 2019.
Epstein's housing location is recorded as H01-001L, which appears to be a special housing unit designation.
The total inmate count at MCC on July 28, 2019, was 767 individuals.
The document is a standard correctional facility roster and count sheet, providing administrative data on the inmate population.
The roster includes hundreds of other inmates, but Epstein is the only one directly relevant to the broader case.
